sentence.Network_en: Meteorological errors are clearly unlikely to be systematic to any great extent.

sentence.Network_en: Every eclipse expedition also collects meteorological data.

sentence.Network_cn: 它们从物理学, 气象学, 经济学或者伦理学的各个不同方面研究它.
